title: Compiler panic

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Ran into a compiler panic while refactoring a function from returning an Option<T> to a Result<T, E>.

In a file full of unit tests with (expected) compilation failures on lines like:
`assert_eq!( [fn that returns Result::Err], None);`

I changed one line over to:
`assert_eq!( [fn that returns Result::Err), Err);`

And got the following panic.

I'll see if I can make a smaller reproduction case.

```
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', src/libcore/option.rs:347:21
note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace.
stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace

             at src/libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:71

query stack during panic:
#0 [has_typeck_tables] processing `std::prelude::v1::Err`
#1 [typeck_tables_of] processing `install_plan::tests::test_invalid_uri`
#2 [typeck_item_bodies] type-checking all item bodies
#3 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate
end of query stack
error: aborting due to 5 previous errors

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0369`.

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.36.0-nightly (3991285f5 2019-04-25) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -Z allow-features=async_await,await_macro,futures_api -C opt-level=0 -C debuginfo=2 -C link-arg=--pack-dyn-relocs=relr -C link-arg=--sysroot=/usr/local/google/home/aaronwood/development/goma/fuchsia/out/default/sdk/exported/zircon_sysroot/arch/x64/sysroot -C link-arg=-L/usr/local/google/home/aaronwood/development/goma/fuchsia/out/default/sdk/exported/zircon_sysroot/arch/x64/sysroot/lib -C link-arg=-L/usr/local/google/home/aaronwood/development/goma/fuchsia/buildtools/linux-x64/clang/lib/clang/9.0.0/x86_64-fuchsia/lib -C link-arg=--threads -C link-arg=-dynamic-linker=ld.so.1 --crate-type bin
```
